Package enigma_edit.lua.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApiFunction
    Functions, that can be called from lua code.
    Assignable
    A reference that can be redirected by assigning a different value.
    Dereferencable
    Any construct that may reference different values when evaluated in different modes.
    Indexed
    Interface to a lua table.
    Resolver
    Interface of a resolver.
    Resolver.Constructor
    Resolver constructor interface.
    Source  
    Tile.Part  
    TileDeclPart
    Part of a tile declaration.
    Typed  
    WoCall
    Base class for any call, that is used to create the world.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeSnippet
    Lua source code location.
    ConstValue
    A special SimpleValue of type integer, that holds a predefined constant.
    Data
    Base class for any data.
    Expression
    An expression within the lua code, that is not interpreted by the CodeAnalyser.
    FieldReference
    This is a special Reference that points to a member of a table.
    LibmapMap  
    MMNil
    Multi-mode nil value.
    MMResolver
    Multi-mode resolver instances.
    MMSimpleValue
    Multi-mode simple value.
    MMTable
    Multi-mode lua table.
    MMTileConstruct
    Multi-mode tile constructor.
    MMTileDecl
    Multi.mode tile declaration.
    MMTilePart
    Multi-mode tile part.
    MMValue
    Multi-mode value.
    MultiMode
    A multi-mode value, that has its own source.
    Nil
    A reference to the nil value.
    ObjectDecl
    Any part of a tile declaration (that is not a reference to another tile).
    Reference
    This represents a reference to a Variable within the code.
    SimpleValue
    A simple value (directly representable by LuaValue).
    SourceData
    Base class for any data, that is defined by a piece of code.
    Table
    A lua table implemented as map between Strings and Variables.
    Tile  
    TileDecl
    A tile declaration.
    TileReference
    This is a special FieldReference, that stores a reference to a member of the Tiles-Resolver.
    Value
    Any source, that defines a value (as opposed to a reference).
    Variable
    This is a representation of the value of an identifier.
    WoCallAPI20
    A call to the lua API function wo() creating the world.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Mode
    Mode type.
    Mode2
    Two-value mode type.
